Pull in records for carrying a fecal sac "FS"
```{r}
fs <- get_breeding_records(behaviors = c("FS")) %>%
  to_EBD_format() %>%
  auk_unique() %>%
  records_as_sf(kind = "observations", method = "points")
```

Print the records
```{r}
print(fs)
```
